title: Honestly, since 10 bans, Yasuo could as well be deleted...
body:
He didnt come through ban phase in one single game I played since the 10 ban system was introduced...

Most times hes even baned by both teams...

replies.body:
>Yasuo could as well be deleted

I'm all for that.

I'm amused by any Yasuo mains who DIDN'T expect this with the 10 bans.  I ban him EVERY game unless someone else on my team does.  And I'll continue to do it until Riot removes his dumbass "cancel a marksman's entire kit" Windwall.  At MINIMUM (absolute, rock-bottom MINIMUM) that piece of shit should dissipate if Yasuo goes through it.  But if I can't negate things like Zed ult with Scimitar, then Yasuo can eat a dick with his Windwall.
Yes, yes let the hate flow through you!
ah well he got through my last game he told us to basically slit out wrists, actual words were to cut out veins but its basically the same thing.
I dont see him banned often tbh lol
He's still being spammed in Normals.

I've seen Yasuo like 3 times.

All of them are with Yasuo going lik 0/6 and then getting a double - then suddenly ending something like 9/9 or 9/6

Would be nice to be able to play my main again.

Pretty sad when your main gets an awesome new skin and your dreading it because it's going to make playing them even harder...

The rework wont help. He'll get banned if hes not completely shit tier and if he is he'll still get banned.

Riot is aware, and I was pretty sure I saw plans to do a mini-rework on him as a result. 

I got pushback when I mentioned this elsewhere, because apparently Yasuo mains are used to the high ban rates? 

What's your take on that? Would you vote to take your chances on a rework for the opportunity to play him more often?

I'm glad they are actually paying attention. It's a shame it took this long for riot to realize how unhealthy he is. All the forums talking about him wasn't enough riot needed to see it for themselves I guess.
